title: Light / Dark mode - done
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is on mlb.com
AND user has favorite team selected
AND user views the Ticket Merchandising Module
custom_expected: The TOM modal is displayed in light mode only

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user's phone is set to light mode
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the TOM modal is displayed in light mode

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user's phone is set to dark mode
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the TOM modal is displayed in light mode

title: TOM Single Card Game UI
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is on mlb.com
AND user has favorite team selected
AND user views the Ticket Merchandising Module

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN user has a favorite team
AND their favorite team has one scheduled game
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user should see the Ticket Merchandising Module

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user views the Ticket Merchandising Module
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the following UI should be displayed:

* hero image
* club logo and single line text
* divider line
* team names
* date
* ballpark
* team logos slightly overlapping each other
* CTA (square v. Oval)

title: Buying tickets functionality
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is on mlb.com
AND user has favorite team selected
AND user views the Ticket Merchandising Module

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user clicks on 'Get Ticket' button
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user is taken to the ticketing page (we do not test the flow)

title: TOM module functionality - user purchases the ticket
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is on mlb.com
AND user has favorite team selected
AND user views the Ticket Merchandising Module

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN use's favorite team has one or more scheduled games
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the Ticket Merchandising Module is displayed
THEN the module stays displayed in the app

title: TOM module functionality - user does not purchase the ticket
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is on mlb.com
AND user has favorite team selected
AND user views the Ticket Merchandising Module

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN use's favorite team has one or more scheduled games
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the Ticket Merchandising Module is displayed

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN user does not purchase the ticket
AND the game goes live
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the module stays displayed in the app
